Articles.Content: As the thread suggests ive seen many plugins and tried using mechjeb to acheive a close rendezvous but none ever seem to come close... Does anyone have any good pointers as to the best most accurate plugin?

The best rendezvous system is in between your ears (it's that mushy grey thing that zombies find delicious with a side of toast, possibly with necrosis jam). ORDA will help you a lot, once you get within visual range. Warp clamps are awesome.

But as for the actual getting there part? Short of some really fancy math, I suggest you do it as the real astronauts do: Slowly, methodically, with a great deal of patience.

I'm not sure how to use ORDA. My attempts so far have consisted of mechjeb rendezvous and then getting close but not being able to get anywhere near even with rcs. Any tips on methodically using orda and how to rendezvous?

Some tips for rendezvous:

Going lower means going faster. If you're closer to the body you are orbiting than your target, you will go faster than it. Likewise, if you go further out, you will go slower.

Patience and RCS.

I have made a tool, not a plugin, that will help you get you to within 1000 meters of a target ship in orbit. It isn't fully tested yet, but I am having great results.

I don't know if you would be interested in something like this. You would open it in excel; easy user interface.
